RecruitmentRequisition.name: RecruitmentRequisition
RecruitmentRequisition.description: Represents a formal request to recruit for a position or a provider vacancy.

ActionPlanTemplateId.description: The action plan template associated with the recruitment requisition.

ApprovalDateTime.description: The date and time when the recruitment requisition was approved.

ApprovalStatus.description: Specifies the approval status of the recruitment requisition.

DefaultPostingLanguage.description: Specifies the default language for vacancy information on a recruitment portal when it can't be shown in the user’s selected language.

ExpectedHireDate.description: The expected start date for an employee or a provider recruited for the vacancy.

ExternalVacancyTitle.description: The title of the vacancy on external recruitment portals.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the recruitment requisition record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

RequisitionType.description: Specifies the type of the recruitment requisition.

State.description: Specifies the state of the recruitment requisition.

VacancyCount.description: The number of vacancies in the advertised job position.

VacancyDescription.description: The description of the vacancy for which you want to recruit.

VacancyTitle.description: The title of the vacancy in the recruitment requisition.

VacancyType.description: Specifies the type of vacancy in the recruitment requisition.
